name: Kirby's Dream Land
synopsis: On a tiny star somewhere far, far away from Earth, there is a very happy place known as Dream Land. That is, until one night the gluttonous King Dedede and his band came to steal all the food and the Dream Landerâ€™s treasured Sparkling Stars. Suddenly, a spry little boy named Kirby happened along and said "Don't worry, I'll get your food and your Sparkling Stars back!". In Kirby's Dream Land, you guide Kirby through a series of side-scrolling action stages. Kirby can walk, fly, inhale and defeat enemies - everything he needs to make it through Mt. Dedede!
